data.chText: 否则；不然
data.enText: used to state what the result would be if sth did not happen or if the situation were different

data.chText: 我父母借钱给我了。否则，我可付不起这次旅费。
data.enText: My parents lent me the money. Otherwise, I couldn't have afforded the trip.

data.chText: 把窗户关好，不然屋子里就太冷了。
data.enText: Shut the window, otherwise it'll get too cold in here.

data.chText: 我们是全心全意投入这项工作的，否则我们就不会到这里来了。
data.enText: We're committed to the project. We wouldn't be here otherwise.

data.chText: 除此以外
data.enText: apart from that

data.chText: 楼上有些音乐声。除此以外，房子里静悄悄的。
data.enText: There was some music playing upstairs. Otherwise the house was silent.

data.chText: 他除了一点青肿之外没有受伤。
data.enText: He was slightly bruised but otherwise unhurt.

data.chText: 在其他方面；另；亦
data.enText: in a different way to the way mentioned; differently

data.chText: 俾斯麦，亦称为“铁血首相”
data.enText: Bismarck, otherwise known as ‘the Iron Chancellor’

data.chText: 不准出售或以其他方式散发过去的试卷。
data.enText: It is not permitted to sell or otherwise distribute copies of past examination papers.

data.chText: 你明明知道这是怎么回事，为什么装作不知道？
data.enText: You know what this is about. Why pretend otherwise (= that you do not) ?

data.chText: 我想见他，但他正忙着别的事情。
data.enText: I wanted to see him but he was otherwise engaged (= doing sth else) .
or otherwise

data.chText: 或其他情况；或相反
data.enText: used to refer to sth that is different from or the opposite of what has just been mentioned

data.chText: 有必要查证这些说法的真实性或虚假性。
data.enText: It was necessary to discover the truth or otherwise of these statements.

data.chText: 我们的保险包括一切意外或其他损失。
data.enText: We insure against all damage, accidental or otherwise.
know different/otherwise

data.chText: 所知道的不是那么回事；所掌握的情况大不一样（或大相径庭）
data.enText: to have information or evidence that the opposite is true

data.chText: 他说他并不在乎批评家的评论，可我知道不是那么回事。
data.enText: He says he doesn't care about what the critics write, but I know different.

simple_means.memory_skill: other 另外的 + wise 方向，方式，状态 → 否则

ex.chText: 现在就做，否则就解雇你。
ex.enText: Do it now, otherwise you'll be fired.

ex.chText: 举起手来，否则就毙了你。
ex.enText: Hands up, otherwise you will be shot.

ex.chText: 穿上外套，不然你会感冒的。
ex.enText: Put your coat on, otherwise you'll catch a cold.

synonyms.bx: 用于表示否定条件，指如果不做某事，就会发生不好的事，含告诫、威胁之意，语气强于 or。

ex.chText: 滚开，不然我就打电话叫警察了。
ex.enText: Get away, or (else) I'll call the cops.

ex.chText: 抓紧时间，不然的话我们就要迟到了。
ex.enText: Hurry up or (else) we'll be late.

synonyms.bx: 词义同 otherwise，但语气较弱，多用于口语，也可与 else 合用。

data.enText: or otherwise

data.chText: 或其他情况；或相反
data.enText: used to refer to sth that is different from or the opposite of what has just been mentioned

data.chText: 有必要查证这些说法的真实性或虚假性。
data.enText: It was necessary to discover the truth or otherwise of these statements.

data.chText: 我们的保险包括一切意外或其他损失。
data.enText: We insure against all damage, accidental or otherwise.
know different/otherwise

data.chText: 所知道的不是那么回事；所掌握的情况大不一样（或大相径庭）
data.enText: to have information or evidence that the opposite is true

data.chText: 他说他并不在乎批评家的评论，可我知道不是那么回事。
data.enText: He says he doesn't care about what the critics write, but I know different.

tr: other than as supposed or expected

example: the funds are not otherwise available
very soon you will know differently
there is no way out other than the fire escape

value.def: You use otherwise after stating a situation or fact, in order to say what the result or consequence would be if this situation or fact was not the case.

example.ex: Make a note of the questions you want to ask. You will invariably forget some of them otherwise...
example.tran: 把想提的问题记下来，否则总是会漏掉其中的一些。

example.ex: I'm lucky that I'm interested in school work, otherwise I'd go mad.
example.tran: 我很庆幸自己对学习怀有兴趣，不然我会疯掉的。

example.ex: ...men who want to provide positive role models for kids who might otherwise be out on the streets.
example.tran: 想为那些可能会流落街头的孩子树立榜样的人

value.def: You use otherwise before stating the general condition or quality of something, when you are also mentioning an exception to this general condition or quality.

example.ex: The decorations for the games have lent a splash of colour to an otherwise drab city.
example.tran: 为运动会所作的装扮给原本毫无生气的城市增添了一抹亮色。

example.ex: ...a blue and gold caravan, slightly travel-stained but otherwise in good condition.
example.tran: 除了在旅途中弄得有点脏以外，性能良好的蓝金色旅行拖车

value.def: You use otherwise to refer in a general way to actions or situations that are very different from, or the opposite to, your main statement.

example.ex: Take approximately 60mg up to four times a day, unless advised otherwise by a doctor...
example.tran: 每次服用大约60毫克，每天最多4次，或遵医嘱。

example.ex: There is no way anything would ever happen between us, and believe me I've tried to convince myself otherwise...
example.tran: 相信我，我已经努力试图说服自己我们之间存有希望，但我们真的是绝对不可能的。

example.ex: All photographs are by the author unless otherwise stated.
example.tran: 若无特殊说明，所有照片均出自该作者。

value.def: You use otherwise to indicate that other ways of doing something are possible in addition to the way already mentioned.

example.ex: The studio could punish its players by keeping them out of work, and otherwise controlling their lives.
example.tran: 电影公司能通过让艺人坐冷板凳来惩罚他们，并采用其他方式控制他们的生活。

value.tran: 以其他方式；用别的方法

value.def: You use or otherwise or and otherwise to mention something that is not the thing just referred to or is the opposite of that thing.

example.ex: It was for the police to assess the validity or otherwise of the evidence...
example.tran: 应该由警方来判定证据有效与否。

example.ex: He didn't want company, talkative or otherwise...
example.tran: 他不想跟人搭伴，不管这个伴儿是否健谈。

example.ex: I was feeling really ill, mentally and otherwise.

value.tran: 及其他；或相反；或其反面

trans: 及其他；或相反；或其反面
最高者有所不同；除…之外

partsOfSpeech.dec: clock 时钟 + wise 方向，方式，状态 → 顺时针地
cross 交叉 + wise 方向，方式，状态 → 交叉地
edge 边缘 + wise 方向，方式，状态 → 边缘向外或向前地
end 末端 + wise 方向，方式，状态 → 末端朝前地
length 长 + wise 方向，方式，状态 → 纵向地，纵长地
other 另外的 + wise 方向，方式，状态 → 否则
side 旁边 + wise 方向，方式，状态 → 斜向一边地
